name: 2022 IEEE IAS Industrial and Commercial Power System Asia (IEEE I&CPS Asia 2022)
content: Conference Proceedings: Submissions to IEEE I&CPS 2022 will be peer reviewed on the basis of technical quality, relevance to conference topics, originality, significance, clarity, etc. Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xplore's scope and quality requirements.
